original_title: Of Dust & Rubies, A Film on Suspension
overview: A public panel about the unfinished film, OF DUST AND RUBIES the last work of the Sudanese filmmaker, painter and poet Hussein Sharrife, who passed away in 2005 before starting the editing process of the film. Through showing some excerpts of the footage, the panel presents different thoughts and questions by five panelists including Hussein Sharrifeâ€™s daughter and one of his close associates.
title: Of Dust & Rubies, A Film on Suspension
